snippet: Planned Parenthood of New York City responds to an editorial, “Women’s Health Care at Risk.”
abstract: Letter from Joan Malin, president, Planned Parenthood of New York City, responds to Feb 29 editorial about reproductive care implications of mergers between Catholic and secular hospitals.
lead_paragraph: Planned Parenthood of New York City responds to an editorial, “Women’s Health Care at Risk.”

headline.main: When Catholic and Secular Hospitals Merge
headline.print_headline: When Catholic and Secular Hospitals Merge
